participant_1.background:
My favorite book is The Little Prince because it reminds me of my dog.
I am a genius, but my parents have no idea about my hobby.
i speak fluent german.
I had a chance to perform my music for a group of people who loved it!
I went to the beach and ate a lot of watermelon.

participant_2.background:
I don't go to Comic Con because it is not my kind of thing.
I love to watch my food come together and to see how the flavors blend.
I almost shot a tourist while playing with my gun.
I live in my hometown right now, but I'm planning to move to Australia in the future.
i am the youngest of 3.

content.text: I'm doing great! Just had a chance to perform my music for a group of people who loved it!
Wow, that's amazing! Congratulations! What kind of music do you play?
I play the guitar and sing. I love to write my own songs.
That's awesome! I love music, but I can't play any instruments. I'm more of a cook.
That's cool too! I love to cook as well. I'm actually planning to open a restaurant one day.
That's a great goal! I'm sure you'll do great. I love to watch my food come together and to see how the flavors blend.
Thanks! I'm really passionate about it. I'm also fluent in German, which will definitely come in handy when I move to Australia.
Oh wow, that's impressive! I'm not sure if I could ever learn another language. I'm already struggling with English!
Haha, it's not too bad. I just love to learn new things. I also love to read, my favorite book is The Little Prince.
I love to read too! I haven't read The Little Prince, but I've heard good things about it.
It's a really great book. It's about a little boy who travels to a strange planet and meets a lot of interesting characters. It's a very inspiring story.
It sounds like a great book, I'll have to check it out.
